availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Judicial body vested with authority over civil and criminal matters from 1776 to 1947. Elevated to the court of last resort in the Constitution of 1947.

ab.bibl:
"New Jersey 1844 State Constitution", New Jersey Department of State, https://www.state.nj.us/state/archives/docconst44.html#art6 (accessed May 7, 2021).
"New Jersey Supreme Court," on New Jersey Supreme Court Virtual Museum, https://njcourts.gov/courts/supreme/vm/scvirtualpic.html#sc (accessed May 7, 2021).
"Organization Chart for Pre 1948 Court System," New Jersey Department of State, https://www.nj.gov/state/archives/catcourtstructure.html (accessed May 28, 2021).
